sentences.en: " I think you'd better not go back,'said Mrs. Pan, very worried.
sentences.cn: “ 我说你一定不要回去, ” 潘师母焦心地说.

sentences.en: " No , it is not ,'said Mrs. Lu Xun. " It's a very tough plant. "
sentences.cn: 许先生说: “ 不怕的, 最耐久! ”

sentences.en: " Those must be pawn shops on fire,'said Mrs. Chang.
According to police accounts, Mr and Mrs Hunt were found dead on the floor of their kitchen.
sentences.cn: 据警方称，亨特夫妇被发现死在家里厨房的地板上。

sentences.en: He hitched his chair to me and told the secrets about Mrs Johnson.
sentences.cn: 他把椅子向我身边挪了挪，然后把约翰逊夫人的秘密告诉了我。
我把 Mrs 错看成了Mr.

sentences.en: I paid Mr. and Mrs. Smith a return visit yesterday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我昨天下午回访了史密斯夫妇.

sentences.en: I will be seeing Mr and Mrs. Johnson. And rest assured I will tell them of your rudeness.
sentences.cn: 我将去见约翰逊夫妇。等着瞧吧，我一定会把你的无礼告诉他们。

sentences.en: It is said that Mrs White rules her husband strictly.
sentences.cn: 据说怀特夫人对她的丈夫管得很严。

sentences.en: Mr and Mrs James Stephens request the pleasure of your company at the marriage of their daughter Caroline Mary to Mr David Smith.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·斯蒂芬斯夫妇敬请您莅临小女卡罗琳·玛丽与戴维·史密斯先生的婚礼。

sentences.en: Mr Brown and Mrs Smith have been carrying on for some months now.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生和史密斯太太发生暧昧关系已经好几个月了。

sentences.en: Mr Harris and Mrs Bate and three other teachers were there.
sentences.cn: 哈里斯老师、贝特老师和其他三位老师在场。

sentences.en: Mrs. Hubbard , you're really pleased with that prize, aren't you?
sentences.cn: 哈伯德先生, 获奖真的很高兴, 是不是?

sentences.en: Mrs. Lin's hiccups were especially sparseabout one every ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 林大娘打嗝的次数更加少了,差不多十分钟只来一回.

sentences.en: On the back of the photo is written the simple caption, "Mrs. Monroe".
sentences.cn: 照片背面只有简单的几个字——“梦露女士”。

sentences.en: She met Mr and Mrs Ricciardi, who were very nice to her.
sentences.cn: 她见到了里恰尔迪夫妇，他们对她非常友好。

sentences.en: The judge divorced Mr. and Mrs. Smith.
sentences.cn: 法官判准史密斯夫妇离婚.
人家将会怎样说 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: 太太，夫人，置于地方、运动、职业等名称之前，用来称呼公认是这事物的代表的已婚妇女
